Song.title: Receive The Glory
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Bob Kauflin © 2004 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Chorus: [G]Not to [G/F#]us, but to Your [C/E]name al[G/D]one Be all the [C]glory, the [G/B]glory for[Am7]ever [D/F#] [G]For Your [G/F#]faithfulness and [C/E]steadfast [Gmaj7/D]love Receive the [C]glory, the [G/B]glory [2/4]Bel[Am7]ongs [D]to [4/4][G]You. [C/G]
Verse 1: [G]All that we’ve accomplished{,} You have [C/G]done for us And [G]any fruit we harvest{,} is a [F2]gift from Your hand [Em]We are only [D]jars of clay That [C]hold a priceless [G/B]treasure And we ex[Am7]ist to bring You [Em7]pleasure, O [Dsus D]God
Verse 2: [G]Only by Your mercy can we [C/G]come to You Though [G]we deserved Your judgment You have [F2]called us by name So we [Em]glory in the [D]cross of Christ That [C]made us Yours for[G/B]ever That [Am]joined our lives toge[Em7]ther to si[Dsus C/E D/F#]ng
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus not to us but to your name alone be all the glory the glory forever for your faithfulness and steadfast love receive the glory the glory belongs to you verse 1 all that weve accomplished you have done for us and any fruit we harvest is a gift from your hand we are only jars of clay that hold a priceless treasure and we exist to bring you pleasure o god verse 2 only by your mercy can we come to you though we deserved your judgment you have called us by name so we glory in the cross of christ that made us yours forever that joined our lives together to sing
